text:
I'm reporting this as request by Craig McClanahan.

class/Servlet reloading is not working in TC4b3, 050202 nightly and others. 

Simple test. Start TC4, execute HelloWorldExample, edit source, compile and 
reload in browser. Fails to display updated Servlet. Restart TC4, update is 
displayed. 

Tested with both Sun's x86 1.3.0_02 and 1.2.2_07 on Win2K sp1.

Several others have reported this on the Tomcat mailing list.

-david
creator: david@i2a.com

There was a problem with the way the entry list was initialized, and if
